Prusa Face Shield RC3 Customiser

Updating Model

This tool can add the date, material type and your name to the Prusa Face Shield RC3 3D model.

If you see a "Page unresponsive" error, hit "Wait", it should work eventually. Making these 3D models is hard on your computer so be patient.

*Note - currently only PETG and PLA are recommended for use in the 3DCrowd.UK project

Suggestions or problems? Create an issue on our github page

With much love for Prusa, customiser built by Paul Hayes and Seb Lee-Delisle. Styling by Orangetronic.
